api_list.name: Stock press release by ISIN code
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tradingradar-net-api1.p.rapidapi.com/api/news/NL0000226223"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tradingradar-net-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

url = "https://tradingradar-net-api1.p.rapidapi.com/api/news/{isin}"

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tradingradar-net-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

print(response.json())
